Accommodate.definition: to make a change or provision for [ a disability] see also reasonable accommodation 2

1.definition: to make a change or provision for [ a disability] see also

2.definition: to accept without compensation responsibility for a debt of (another person) in the event of nonpayment as a way of reassuring a reluctant creditor see alsoatat
2.note: To accommodate a debtor effectively, the party must sign the debt instrument, adding words describing limitations or conditions to the accommodation, if any.
